title: VA - We Got The Funk@flac
description:
Funk came of age in the 1970s when a term used in jazz circles for the previous two decades crossed over to the dancefloor. 
Our 16 slices are served up by acts ranging from Parliament - one of the genre&#039;s undisputed trendsetters, led by the irrepressible George Clinton - to Afro-rockers Osibisa and Cymande, taking in acts as diverse as girl group Honeycone and legendary &#039;Hustle&#039; hitmakers The Fatback Band. Chairmen of the Board are one of five artists featured from the Invictus/Hot Wax stable, founded by the writing/production trio of Holland, Dozier and Holland. They struck out on their own after scoring hits with innumerable Motown acts; you can hear a touch of Stevie Wonder in &#039;Finders Keepers&#039;. From Detroit we travel to New Jersey for our collection&#039;s title track, performed by female vocal duo Positive Force, which wrote their name in the last UK chart of the decade. 
If it&#039;s dance music with a heavy bass line and layered guitar, keyboard and vocals you&#039;re after, look no further - &#039;We Got The Funk&#039;! (from liner notes)



01. Positive Force - We Got The Funk                             
02. Cymande - The Message                                        
03. Trouble Funk - Pump Me Up                                    
04. The Fatback Band - Street Dance                              
05. Brother To Brother - In The Bottle                           
06. Laura Lee - Crumbs Off The Table                             
07. Freda Payne - Unhooked Generation                            
08. The Rythm Makers - Zone                                      
09. William DeVaughn - Be Thankful For What You Got              
10. Osibisa - Sunshine Day                                       
11. Chairmen Of The Board - Finders Keepers                      
12. Honey Cone - Want Ads                                        
13. The Kay-Gees - Get Down                                    
14. The Politicians - Free Your Mind                             
15. The 8th Day - Cheba                                          
16. Parliament - Come In Out Of The Rain
